intropage.preamble:
You have reached the logically existing, virtual ACE+TAO scoreboard. It shows all the OS/compiler combinations ACE+TAO are tested against everyday, all over the world. We have builds running continuously at Washington University, St. Louis, University of California,Irvine, ISIS,Vanderbilt University, Automatic Trading Desk, LMCO-ATL, University of Maryland, Charles University, BBN Technologies, Remedy IT, Hunleth.com, RT Logic!, Riverace Corporation, PrismTech, DRE Systems, and WAEI.
The distributed scoreboard is divided into following five categories:
ACE Builds for Beta/Release
ACE Builds not for Beta/Release
TAO Builds for Beta/Release
TAO Builds not for Beta/Release
Miscellaneous Builds
Integrated page having all the above in a single page for folks who like it!
If you'd like to contribute builds to our virtual scoreboard please contact us and let us know which platform combinations you can contribute. Instructions for setting up your own daily build and scoreboard are here
We use the daily builds as a basis to collect important metrics like compilation time, footprint and performance details. Please refer to this page for more details.
